title: Berry Burst Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
In the debut Oreo Oration, Greg gives you a detailed review of Berry Burst Ice Cream Oreo Cookies. 

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Check out the Oreo Oration playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&feature=plcp

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

look that's tearing open up the package breaking that seal oh good lord look at how good those look are you got that you got that black against the pink that they get want to get a good whiff of the bouquet see ya sorry I'm not melts water you got there so good ladies and gentlemen they smell sweet but they're not overpowering you don't open up it doesn't smell like a cake factory they are pretty much a really good cookie but let's go like I say I say first look amazing they're all lined up there none of them are broken they are all intact that's what we want we want a good looking right of course next for any Oreo is the taste we break one on there and let's get a little look at that look see at that little guy oh my goodness gracious taste is a big part of it let's try here mmm no I'll tell you what it's waiver country and you're all invited all you have to do is go to the store right now your body's berry burst Oreo ice cream oh so good oh no you know obviously it's what you want

tell you what it's waiver country and you're all invited all you have to do is go to the store right now your body's berry burst Oreo ice cream oh so good oh no you know obviously it's what you want out of it all right the cookie isn't soggy nice and crisp that's part of Nabisco's patented sealing technology here on their bag really good chocolaty taste complimented well by the berry burst there it's a strawberry it's that artificial strawberry flavoring we all love it's an Oreo cookie though so the big part is how does it pair with milk let's get a check see ya excited decide not be part of the show I think yeah we'll do it we'll do the full on dunk dunkaroo here bring it out here in front see how you know peri an Oreo with milk it sounds easier you want to make sure it's taking the milk well right you wanna make sure he's accepting of all the milk that everything's going well and then of course it's all about taste how does it taste it does the strawberry go well with nook where I

and gentlemen I'm going on a 20-point scale here so you know 7 7 5 8 8 5 I would give the berry burst Oreo a 9 5 it is flat-out amazing ladies and gentlemen it sets the bar for all Oreos for all Oreos you'll see in the Oreo aeration will others stand up we don't know that's a big part of the show you'll have to keep tuning in so yeah that's how I keep you on the hook as they say so that's the way the cookie crumbles for the berry burst ice cream Oreos I'm clever I know but what do you think leave your review of berry burst ice cream Oreos in the video responses below then like the video then subscribe to my channel all that's now here's the big thing are there Oreos in the wild I am missing if so name them in the comments then share this video with your friends I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on Duncan [Music]
